channel.title: Proxy Server and Private Servers?
channel.description: I am at boarding school and the boarders here use proxy settings to connect to the internet i.e Tools -> Internet Options... -> Connection Settings -> LAN Settings -> Use a proxy server for your LAN... -> Address = 10.1.1.3/Port = 8080. And I am having problems connecting to any servers, I am not sure if this is because of these settings or what. So could someone please tell me if it is a problem with these proxy settings or something else and if there are any obvious solutions.

item.title: Proxy Server and Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @mark033 mark033
item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

I am at boarding school and the boarders here use proxy settings to connect to the internet i.e Tools -> Internet Options… -> Connection Settings -> LAN Settings -> Use a proxy server for your LAN… -> Address = 10.1.1.3/Port = 8080. And I am having problems connecting to any servers, I am not sure if this is because of these settings or what. So could someone please tell me if it is a problem with these proxy settings or something else and if there are any obvious solutions.
